DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , non-randomized , multi-center , patient sponsor study Adipose-Derived Stromal Vascular Fraction cell ( AD-SVF ) implantation deliver corpus cavernous patient Erectile Dysfunction . The intent clinical study answer question : 1 ) Is propose treatment safe 2 ) Is treatment effective improve disease pathology patient diagnose Erectile Dysfunction .
DOC.brief_title: Autologous Adipose-Derived Stromal Cells Delivered Into Corpus Cavernous Patients With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: AD-SVF collect patient 's adipose-derived tissue ( body fat ) . Using local anesthesia , Liposuction perform collect adipose tissue specimen . The adipose tissue transfer laboratory separation adipose tissue derive stem cell . In addition , peripheral blood collect isolation platelet rich plasma , combine ASC 's direct injection Corpus Cavernosum ( Penis ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Males Age 18 80 year . Penile arterial insufficiency venous leakage ( doppler ) time inclusion : PSV < 25 cm/sec , PSV > 25 cm/sec , EDV > 5cm/sec , RI < 0,75 . Up date age gender appropriate cancer screen per American Cancer Society Exclusion Criteria Severe comorbidities like cardiac insufficiency , congestive cardiac failure ( NYHA ≥ III ) , malignancy , infection , sepsis bed sore . Life expectancy < 6 month due concomitant illness . Exposure investigational drug procedure within 1 month prior study entry enrol concurrent study may confound result study . Active infectious disease . Patients know tested positive HIV , HTLV , HBV , HCV , CMV ( IgM > IgG ) and/or syphilis evaluate expert patient eligibility base patient 's infectious status Any illness , Investigator 's judgment , interfere patient 's ability comply protocol , compromise patient safety , \ interfere interpretation study result Patients chronic immunosuppressive transplant therapy Systolic blood pressure ( supine ) ≤90 mmHg great 200mmHg Resting heart rate > 100 bpm ; Active clinical infection within one week enrollment . Known drug alcohol dependence factor interfere study conduct interpretation result opinion investigator suitable participate . History cancer ( nonmelanoma skin cancer insitu cervical cancer ) last five year . Unwilling and/or able give write informed consent .
